city square intercom left door button marked hadn’t managed warn late greatly relieved voice intercom door clicked building shared residential apartments don’t worry – it’s select city besides hotel front door guest securely locked inside pleasant lobby floor reception extremely grateful patience night staff – spanish isn’t neither english slowly explained checked found 2am isn’t late madrid it’s nocturnal city staff duty day spoke fluent english equally helpful patient explaining capital cities expensive affordable tiny distance city centre found plus suitcases swallowed huge walkin wardrobe surprisingly airy ceilings ensuite bathroom actually stand subject bathroom suffered cold shower morning realised tap door governed water temperature tap bath windows onto internal courtyard fairly typical spanish custom view fresh air traffic noise front quiet square outside pedestrianized welcome nocturnal city location deserted square front opera house plus metro station plus taxi rank handy there’s convenience store selling food road it’s 10 minutes walk pedestrianized streets main metro station sol plaza mayor palace 5 minutes walk past opera house streets hotel plaza mayor awash restaurants chocolate shop recommended guidebooks selling chocolate con churros ate restaurant night plenty hadn’t visited week bear mind nocturnal habits city mean shops don’t tend 930am challenge you’ve popped buy breakfast quickly learnt buy breakfast night subject late nights yellow airport bus runs night 30 minutes costs 2 euros person lots special racks carry everyone’s luggage terminates central location plenty taxis available saved lot money getting bus airport city taking taxi bus terminus hotel taxi 30 35 euros highly recommend airport bus taxi metro anyway madrid definitely recommend hostal oriente pleased stay
